slides.title: Gradual Return is Safer
slides.content: A phased return to work prevents re-injury and builds confidence through progressive exposure

slides.title: Modify Tasks Early
slides.content: Start with lighter duties and shorter hours, gradually building up as your body adapts

slides.title: Communicate with Employer
slides.content: Open dialogue about your capabilities helps create a supportive return-to-work plan

slides.title: Learn More
